mapper.select: SELECT COURT_CODE AS courtCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtRegisteredDate , COURT_MAP_POSITION AS mapPosition , POSX AS mapPositionX , POSY AS mapPositionY , REGISTRANT_ACCT_CODE AS registrantAccountCode , USER_NICKNAME AS registrantNickname , NVL(MY_COURT_COUNT,0) AS myCourtCount , COURT_IMG1 AS courtImg1 , COURT_IMG2 AS courtImg2 , COURT_IMG3 AS courtImg3 , COURT_NAME_CODE AS courtNameCode , COURT_NAME AS courtName , COURT_NAME_TOTAL_PERCENT AS courtNamePollRate , AVG_COURT_MNG_SCORE AS avgCourtManageScore , AVG_COURT_SATISFACTION AS avgCourtSatisfaction , COURT_RATING AS courtRating , MIN_COURT_CAPACITY AS minCourtCapacity , MAX_COURT_CAPACITY AS maxCourtCapacity , WASHROOM AS toilet , CONFIDENCE_WASHROOM AS toiletConfidence , SHWER_ROMM AS shower , CONFIDENCE_SHWER_ROMM AS showerConfidence , PARKING_LOT AS parkinglot , CONFIDENCE_PARKING_LOT AS parkinglotConfidence , ENROLLMENT_YES_COUNT AS enrollYesCount , ENROLLMENT_NO_COUNT AS enrollNoCount , COURT_DELREQ_CODE AS delRequestCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_DELREQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS delRequestDate , TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS delApproveDate , COURT_DELETE_POLL_YES AS delRequestPollYesCount , COURT_DELETE_POLL_NO AS delRequestPollNoCount , DEL_ADMIN_CODE AS delAdminCode , TO_CHAR(ADMIN_COURT_DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS adminDelDate , COURT_STATUS AS courtStatus , BLIND_STATUS AS blindStatus FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(COURT_MAP_POSITION, 1, INSTR(COURT_MAP_POSITION, ',', 1, 1) - 1)) AS POSX , TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(COURT_MAP_POSITION, INSTR(COURT_MAP_POSITION, ',', 1, 1) + 1)) AS POSY , C.* FROM VIEW_COURT C ) A WHERE POWER(POSX-#{posX},2) + POWER(POSY-#{posY},2) <= POWER(#{distance},2)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_COURT_NAME WHERE COURT_NAME_STATUS NOT LIKE '제재' AND COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIEW_COURT_REVIEW WHERE COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode} AND COURT_REVIEW_STATUS != '삭제' AND COURT_REVIEW_STATUS != '제재'

SELECT COURT_REG_CODE AS courtCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtRegisteredDate , COURT_MAP_POSITION AS mapPosition , REGISTRANT_ACCT_CODE AS registrantAccountCode , USER_NICKNAME AS registrantNickname , NVL(MY_COURT_COUNT,0) AS myCourtCount , COURT_IMG1 AS courtImg1 , COURT_IMG2 AS courtImg2 , COURT_IMG3 AS courtImg3 , COURT_NAME_CODE AS courtNameCode , COURT_NAME AS courtName , COURT_NAME_TOTAL_PERCENT AS courtNamePollRate , AVG_COURT_MNG_SCORE AS avgCourtManageScore , AVG_COURT_SATISFACTION AS avgCourtSatisfaction , COURT_RATING AS courtRating , MIN_COURT_CAPACITY AS minCourtCapacity , MAX_COURT_CAPACITY AS maxCourtCapacity , WASHROOM AS toilet , CONFIDENCE_WASHROOM AS toiletConfidence , SHWER_ROMM AS shower , CONFIDENCE_SHWER_ROMM AS showerConfidence , PARKING_LOT AS parkinglot , CONFIDENCE_PARKING_LOT AS parkinglotConfidence , ENROLLMENT_YES_COUNT AS enrollYesCount , ENROLLMENT_NO_COUNT AS enrollNoCount , COURT_DELREQ_CODE AS delRequestCode , TO_CHAR(COURT_DELREQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS delRequestDate , TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS delApproveDate , COURT_DELETE_POLL_YES AS delRequestPollYesCount , COURT_DELETE_POLL_NO AS delRequestPollNoCount , DEL_ADMIN_CODE AS delAdminCode , TO_CHAR(ADMIN_COURT_DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS adminDelDate , COURT_STATUS AS courtStatus , BLIND_STATUS AS blindStatus FROM VIEW_COURT WHERE COURT_REG_CODE = #{courtCode}

SELECT COURT_REVIEW_CODE AS courtReviewCode , COURT_REVIEW_CONTENT AS courtReviewContent , COURT_REVIEW_MNG_SCORE AS courtReviewManageScore , COURT_REVIEW_REG_DATE AS courtReviewRegisteredDate , COURT_REVIEW_SATISFACTION AS courtReviewSatisfaction , MIN_COURT_CAPACITY AS minCourtCapacity , MAX_COURT_CAPACITY AS maxCourtCapacity , COURT_REG_CODE AS courtCode , REGISTRANT_ACCT_CODE AS registrantAccountCode , REGISTRANT_NICKNAME AS registrantNickname , TO_CHAR(COURT_REVIEW_DEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS courtReviewDelDate , COURT_REVIEW_STATUS AS courtReviewStatus , LIKES AS likes , DISLIKES AS dislikes , TOILET AS toilet , SHOWER AS shower , PARK AS parkinglot FROM VIEW_COURT_REVIEW WHERE COURT_REG_CODE=#{courtCode} AND REGISTRANT_ACCT_CODE=#{userAccountCode}
